com.qualitestgroup.util.fileio

Class FileTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualitestgroup.util.fileio.FileTools

  • public final class FileTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods for opening and saving different types of files.
    Author:
    Matthew Swircenski

      • getSafeInt

        public static int getSafeInt(java.lang.String toInt)
        Converts a string representation of a number to an integer.
        Parameters:
        toInt - The String representing the integer. Accepts valid double notation, such as "123", "1.23", and "-8.56e3". Numbers with decimals are rounded to the nearest value.
        Returns:
        integer value of toInt. If the value cannot be converted to an integer, 0 is returned instead. If the value would be greater than 2147483647 or less than -2147483648, those values are returned instead. is returned instead.
